explains: v. 把……编成管弦乐曲；精心安排，密谋；把……协调地结合起来

sentences.en: The colonel was able to orchestrate a rebellion from inside an army jail.
sentences.cn: 上校得以在陆军监狱里精心组织了一场叛乱。

sentences.en: Automatically orchestrate API calls as needed.
sentences.cn: 根据需要自动编排api调用。

sentences.en: The virtualization system should orchestrate this for you.
sentences.cn: 虚拟化系统应为您安排这种情况。
